Name: Saloon Showdown VR
About the game: Saloon Showdown VR is a virtual reality shooter based in the old west. Can you make your way through the town and stand toe to toe with the deadliest gun in west? Make use of cover, exploding barrels, moving carts & your trusty old 6-shooter and return peace to this lawless town.
